steps: In a pressure cooker mix beef,salt,vinegar and black pepper,on a medium flame cook for two or three whistles (or until beef is 90% done)
In a pan add oil and onions and suate them till they are golden brown colour.
Add gingerGarlic paste and suate for another two minutes.
In a pan add oil and onions and suate them till they are golden brown in colour.
Add ginger garlic paste and saute well.
Add the cut and cleanead eggplant piesces, stirr well and coat the eggplant with the masala.
Add salt to taste and cover with alid until eggplant is cooked.
Add hot water to make more gravy.
Marinate chicken with red chilly powder,salt, and ginger Gralic paste for atleast 20 minutes
Shallow fry the chicken pieces and keep it aside
In the same pan add oil, onions and butter and saute till they are golden
In a pan mix tomatoes,salt,tamarind water and black pepper.
On a medium flame bring to boil.
